# Test Results Summary
## CI Pipeline Results

| Test Category | Status | Count | Description |

| Attack Detection | ✓ PASS | 6 | MAC/CRC injection |
| Access Control | ✓ PASS | 3 | Authorization |
| Replay Protection | ✓ PASS | 1 | Replay defense |
| Anomaly IDS | ✓ PASS | 6 | Behavioral detection |
**Total Tests Executed:** 293
**Total Failures:** 0

## Security Features Tested
- Message Authentication (HMAC-SHA256)
- Data Integrity (CRC32)
- CAN ID Access Control (TX/RX Whitelists)
- Replay Attack Prevention (Sliding Window + Timestamps)
- Attack Detection (Threshold-Based State Machine)
- Rate Limiting & DoS Prevention
- Anomaly-Based Intrusion Detection (Statistical Profiling)
- Secure Firmware Updates & Baseline Persistence
